document_data.name: Bang Zi Mara Shan
document_data.georefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2021-02-13 - Far-Flung Netherese Enclaves}}{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-07-18 - Locations of Far-Flung Enclaves}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Bang Zi Mara Shan''' was a range of mountains in northern [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Geography: The mountain range was found to the east of the larger [[Koryaz Mountains]], bordering the lands of [[Chukei]] and the [[Yellow Sea]]. To the north lay the [[Mountains of Amara]] and the [[Valley of Nanayok]], and to the east in the ocean were the [[Talmaruk Islands]].
